title: RIDE 2 + 2 DLC (MULTI 6)
description:

Kawasaki and Ducati DLC
Aprilia and Suzuki DLC

Interface Language: English, German, Spanish, Italian, French, Portuguese-Brazil
Audio Language: English, German, Spanish, Italian, French, Portuguese-Brazil
Crack: built-in (ALI213/CODEX)

Minimum requirements:
Operating System: WindowsÂ® 7 SP1 / WindowsÂ® 8 / WindowsÂ® 8.1 / WindowsÂ® 10
Processor: Intel i5 2500K 3.3GHz / AMD Phenom II X4 850 or equivalent
RAM: 4 GB
Video Card: GeForce GT 640 / Radeon HD 6670 1GB*

HDD Space: 32 GB (~43 GB during installation)

Repack Features :

Based on Ride.2-CODEX ISO release: codex-ride.2.iso (28,413,591,552 bytes)
Ride.2.Special.Edition.DLC.PACK-ALI213 applied, CODEX crack replaced with ALI213. CODEX crack moved to NoDVD folder, available after installation
Ride 2 Aprilia and Suzuki Bonus Pack & Ride 2 Kawasaki and Ducati Bonus Pack included and activated
100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 26.5 to 15.6 GB)
Installation takes: ~1 hour on 8 cores CPU + SSD; ~1 hour 20 minutes on 4-cores CPU + SSD; ~2 hours on 4-cores CPU + HDD; up to 3 hours on 2-cores CPU + HDD
After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
HDD space after installation: 32 GB (~43 GB during installation)

How to install :

Mount or burn
Install
Play
